modName: Texture Optimizer .INI with vanilla size texture
summary:
modified ordenador.ini match with vanilla texture res

.ini is suitable for those of you who have a low spec PC but want to use a Hi res texture mods

this modified .ini will match res texture mod with vanilla

this is just Ordenador.ini file, Optimizer Textures required
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]modified ordenador.ini match with vanilla texture res [/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]this .ini file is suitable for those of you who have a low spec PC but want to use a Hi res texture mods [/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]this modified .ini will match res texture mod with vanilla[/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]this is just Ordenador.ini file, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12801/?]Optimizer Textures[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12801/?] [/url]by AdPipino is required


[/size]Usage:
[list][*][size=2]Download and extract [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12801/?]Optimizer Textures[/url] by AdPipino First[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Download and extract my Ordenador.ini, place it where Ordenador.exe exist[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Run Ordenador.exe as administrator[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Select textures folder inside Data folder of your Skyrim[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]check all options[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]then start[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]

[/size]Credits:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12801/?]Optimizer Textures[/url] by AdPipino

author: Sempal
